text: Vista (Spanish: View) is a city in northern San Diego County, California, United States. As of 2020, the city has a population of 98,381 people. It was incorporated (became a self-governing entities under state laws) on January 28, 1963. The city is seven miles away from the Pacific Ocean. In 2008, Vista was called the seventh-best place to live in the United States because of its job opportunities, education, climate and cost of living.50 Fabulous Places to Raise Your Family, 3rd Ed. 2006 Kathleen Shaputis == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Settlements in San Diego County, California Category:Cities in California Category:1963 establishments in California
title: Vista, California
